name: Heavy Gold
description:
The more loot you have, the slower and sluggish you are.

There are goblins who want to hurt you.

There are goblins who are more interested in the loot.
Some loot is heavier.

LMB to move.
RMB to swing your sword.
SPACE to drop the heaviest loot you have.

You are Hoxan! A legendary hero too deep inside a dungeon.
Gather loot falling from the cracks from the level above.
Kill goblins with your mighty dreihander.

Loot info:
Silver - Heavy, worthless
Gold - Heavy, worth slightly more
Rubies - Light, worth significantly more
Diamonds - Light, worth a lot
